text: @GHS @DrTedros @WHO @MattHancock & @DominicRaab  are you both going to wait around doing nothing? Get labs to dedicate themselves to regularly testing the whole population so we can pin this #COVID19 down. You get your herd immunity & economy working, we get to leave home & stop waiting for sickness
